task.title: Install on or
task.shortdesc: Packaged versions of are available for 8 and 9 and 14.04, 16.04 and 18.04.

context.p: The repository for the APT package management system is https://apt.puppet.com. Packages are named using the convention <PLATFORM_VERSION>-release-<VERSION CODE NAME>.deb. For example, the release package for 6 Platform on 8 “Jessie” is puppet6-release-jessie.deb.

step.cmd: Download and install the software and its dependencies. Use the commands appropriate to your system.

choices.choice: 8 wget https://apt.puppet.com/puppet6-release-jessie.deb sudo dpkg -i puppet6-release-jessie.deb sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install puppet-bolt
9 wget https://apt.puppet.com/puppet6-release-stretch.deb sudo dpkg -i puppet6-release-stretch.deb sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install puppet-bolt
14.04 wget https://apt.puppet.com/puppet6-release-trusty.deb sudo dpkg -i puppet6-release-trusty.deb sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install puppet-bolt
16.04 wget https://apt.puppet.com/puppet6-release-xenial.deb sudo dpkg -i puppet6-release-xenial.deb sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install puppet-bolt
18.04 wget https://apt.puppet.com/puppet6-release-bionic.deb sudo dpkg -i puppet6-release-bionic.deb sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install puppet-bolt
